TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WSFederationHttpSecurityMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 为 指定不同的安全模式。

span.span: Specifies the different security modes for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此枚举定义 支持的安全模式。This enumeration defines the security modes that the supports. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何将 设置为此枚举的成员。The following code shows how to set to a member of this enumeration. [!code-csharp[WSFederationHttpSecurity#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wsfederationhttpsecurity/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WSFederationHttpSecurity#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wsfederationhttpsecurity/vb/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode Message = int32(1)

summary.span: 通过使用 SOAP 消息安全，可以提供完整性、保密性、服务器身份验证和客户端身份验证。

span.span: Integrity, confidentiality, server authentication and client authentication are provided using SOAP message security.

summary.span: 默认情况下，将对正文进行加密和签名。

span.span: By default, the body is encrypted and signed.

summary.span: 此服务必须使用证书进行配置。

span.span: The service must be configured with a certificate.

summary.span: 客户端根据由安全令牌服务颁发给客户端的令牌进行身份验证。

span.span: Client authentication is based on the token issued to the client by a security token service.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode None = int32(0)

summary.span: SOAP 消息在传输过程中并不安全。

span.span: The SOAP message is not secure during transfer.

summary.span: 未联系到任何安全令牌服务。

span.span: No Security Token Service is contacted.

summary.span: 此模式相当于将 绑定与 一起使用。

span.span: This mode is equivalent to using the binding with .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode TransportWithMessageCredential = int32(2)

summary.span: 完整性、保密性和服务器身份验证均由 HTTPS 提供。

span.span: Integrity, confidentiality and server authentication are provided by HTTPS.

summary.span: 此服务必须使用证书进行配置。

span.span: The service must be configured with a certificate.

summary.span: 客户端身份验证采用 SOAP 消息安全方式提供，并根据由安全令牌服务颁发给客户端的令牌进行。

span.span: Client authentication is provided by means of SOAP message security and is based on the token issued to the client by a security token service.
